notes:
Raid occurs in different cities at different times. You will never know in which city until the raid is announced. Normally spawns near depot but also on other locations throughout the city. Raids occur during April fool's month.
<gallery captionalign="left" mode="nolines">
Undead jester.GIF|Some undead jesters and their abilities.
</gallery>
abilities: {{Ability List| {{Melee|?}}|{{Ability|[[Drunkness|Liquor Cream Cake]] causes heavy [[Drunkenness]]|element=drunk}}|{{Ability|[[Cave Rat|Musical Bomb]]|[[summon]]s 4 [[Cave Rat]]s|element=summon}}|{{Ability|[[Self-Healing]]|makes confetti|element=healing}}|{{Ability|[[Invisibility]]|looks similar to [[Death Strike]]|element=invisible}}|{{Ability|[[Paralyze|Paralyzing Confetti Wave]]|element=paralyze}} }}

name: Undead Jester
sounds: Resistance is futile! You will be amused!
Why did the chicken cross the road? TO KILL YOU!!!
I will teach you all to mock me!
He who laughs last, Laughs best!
A zathroth priest, a druid and a paladin walk into a bar ...
And now for something completely different!
You think this is funny now?
behaviour: Keeps distance, [[retarget]]s and runs in yellow health.
location: [[Ab'Dendriel]], [[Ankrahmun]], [[Carlin]], [[Darashia]], [[Edron]], [[Kazordoon]] (floor -3, between entrance and [[depot]]), [[Liberty Bay]], [[Port Hope]] (west, east and south across river from [[Depot]]), [[Svargrond]], [[Thais]], [[Venore]], [[Yalahar]].
strategy: Just kill them. [[Dwarven Ring]] is a must or you will waste a lot of time trying to reach them.
